General.Name: Bossa Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmeleri TAS
General.Description: Bossa Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmeleri T.A.S. engages in the production, marketing, and sale of textile products in Turkey and internationally. It offers various denim fabrics. The company was incorporated in 1951 and is headquartered in Adana, Turkey.
General.Address: Haci Sabanci Organize Sanayi BOelgesi, Adana, Turkey, 01410
